content: Delivered mysql, mysql, redis-based improvements by transforming ad-hoc tasks into repeatable, automated processes that improved productivity and accuracy for clients.
original:
Improve this resume bullet:
""нужна разовая (пока) консультация по улучшению работы приложения.ситуация такая - работает приложение из нескольких серверов(одинаковых) параллельно. на них с одной стороны приходят внешние уведомления(вебхуки). все уведомления содержат уникальный ID. иногда эти входящие уведомления задваиваются. наше приложение с серверов должно отправить свое исходящее уведомление(вебхук), но только одно, даже если входящие задвоились. сейчас это решается так, что все отправленные уведомления с ID пишутся в бд mysql и если уведомление c ID уже отправлено(проверяется в БД), то не отправляем второй раз. это работает почти всегда, 99.9% времени. проблема возникает в ситуации, если входящие уведомления приходят 2-3 одновременно(миллисекунды) с одним ID. Каждое уведомление проверяется в БД, там ещё ничего нет(и запись в mysql не мгновенная), и отправляется исходящее уведомление, получается что тоже 2-3 раза. как сделать, чтобы проверка существования уведомления была точнее? т.е. если пришло уведомление, быстрее чем сейчас запомнить его ID и другие серверы бы не отправили исходящие уведомления повторно для такого ID?наверняка есть какой-то стандартный способ решения...например, проверить в бд, подождать 1 сек и ещё раз проверить.или запустить условный redis и там все ID сохранять для быстрой проверки.или ещё какой вариант.желательно вариант требующий меньше работы по подключению.хостинг на aws, может там что-то готовое есть.Hourly Range: $25.00-$50.00Posted On: February 18, 2024 13:36 UTCCategory: Full Stack DevelopmentSkills:Web Application, MySQL, Amazon Web ServicesSkills: Web Application, MySQL, Amazon Web ServicesCountry: Slovakia""

capture of the user experience.Detailed Testing Flow for Banger App User Experience Test1-Initial App Launch: Begin the test by launching the app and bypassing the onboarding paywall, ensuring the tester starts as a free user with 2 initial credits.2-Creating a Cover: Direct testers to navigate to the 'Covers' section, select a song, and create a cover, observing the deduction of one credit.3-Upgrading the Cover: With the remaining credit, testers should upgrade their short cover to a full version and note when the credit balance is zero.4-Credit Timer Observation: Testers need to check and report the timer that indicates when new credits will be allocated for further activities.5-Voice Creation: Move to the 'Voices' tab, create a new voice model using the voice recording option, and complete the voice training process.6-Payment Process: After training their voice, testers should proceed through the payment process to unlock full features, for which they will be reimbursed.7-Finalizing Voice and Creating a New Cover: Once the voice model is ready, use it to create another cover, and capture the reaction to listening to the newly created cover.8-Free Exploration: Finally, testers should freely explore the app to discover additional features or details, continuously recording their screen and reactions.Note: The testing should mimic a genuine user journey, capturing authentic reactions to the app’s interface, functionalities, and overall user experience.Deliverables:- A full screen recording of the app session in phone.- A video capturing the original:
Improve this resume bullet:
""Improve Existing Logo DesignObjective:Enhance the existing logo of medical practice to make it more visually appealing and memorable, ensuring it effectively serves its purpose in both outdoor signage and digital formats. The improved logo should convey trust, professionalism, and care, reflecting the practice's commitment to exceptional healthcare services.1. Review and Analysis:- Conduct a thorough review of the current logo to identify its strengths and weaknesses.- Gather feedback from stakeholders, including staff, patients, and the general public, to understand perceptions and areas needing improvement.2. Theme and Elements:- Retain elements from the existing logo strongly associated with healthcare and medicine, such as a medical cross, stethoscope, heart, or other relevant symbols, while introducing enhancements or additional elements to modernize the design.- Aim for a balance between simplicity and visual impact, ensuring the logo is easily recognizable in various sizes and formats.3. Color Scheme:- Re-evaluate the current color palette; consider adjustments or a new scheme that promotes feelings of calmness, trust, and cleanliness. Preferred shades may include variations of blue, green, or other colors traditionally linked with healthcare.- The updated colors should be versatile for vibrant color and practical grayscale applications.4. Typography:- Assess the current font for readability and professionalism. Opt for a more suitable font if necessary, ensuring it is legible from a distance and on digital screens.- Maintain or enhance the clarity and prominence of the practice's name within the logo design.5. Versatility and Scalability:- Ensure the updated logo is adaptable across different media, including outdoor signage, digital platforms (website headers, social media profiles), business cards, and promotional materials.- Confirm the design's scalability, preserving its visual integrity and legibility across various sizes.6. File Formats:- Provide the updated logo in various file formats to cover diverse usage needs, including vector (AI or EPS), PNG, JPEG, and PDF.7. Mockups:- Offer mockups showing the revised logo in situ, such as on outdoor signage and digital platforms, to illustrate its adaptability and the improvements in visual impact.Deliverables:1. Assessment Report: A detailed report highlighting the initial review and feedback analysis findings.2. Logo Design Concept(s): Present revised design concepts based on the assessment for stakeholder review.3. Final Logo Design: Deliver the final, refined logo design incorporating stakeholder feedback.4. File Package: A complete set of the final logo in various file formats.5. Usage Guidelines: Updated guidelines detailing the logo's application, including color specifications, dos and don'ts, and recommendations for use across different media.Timeline:- Assessment Report and Initial Concepts Due: February 26th- Feedback and Revision Period: February 28th- Final Deliverables Due: March 1stEvaluation Criteria:- Improved relevance to healthcare and medicine.- Enhanced visual appeal and memorability.- Greater versatility and adaptability across different media.- Improved clarity and legibility of design and typography.Budget: $150Posted On: February 23, 2024 09:26 UTCCategory: Brand Identity DesignSkills:Brand Identity Design, Brand Guidelines, Logo Design, Brand Identity & Guidelines, Graphic DesignSkills: Brand Identity Design, Brand Guidelines, Logo Design, Brand Identity & Guidelines, Graphic DesignCountry: Romania""

content: Delivered sme, charitat, vna-based improvements by transforming ad-hoc tasks into repeatable, automated processes that improved productivity and accuracy for clients.
original:
Improve this resume bullet:
""Sme charitatívna umelecká komunita, ktorá sa v súčasnosti zameriava na premietanie zahraničných filmov. Ako predohru k filmovým projekciám plánujeme vytvoriť informačnú prednášku, ktorá pomôže "naservírovať" film divákovi a poskytne potrebné súvislosti o výrobe filmu, informácie o živote producenta, kontexte vzniku filmu, ako aj o tom, prečo film vyniká.(Planujeme 6 premietani do konca aprila takze 6 prac takeho typu)Toto zadanie je pre film: FRAGILE MEMORY // КРИХКА ПАМ'ЯТЬNa realizáciu projektu by bolo dobré mať nasledujúce zručnosti:- Základné znalosti o filme (Text by nemal byť akademickou analýzou, ale ani príliš základnou, mal by byť pútavý pre diváka s mierne nadpriemernou úrovňou filmových skúseností. Nie článok z wikipédie - mal by sprostredkovať všetky potrebné zaujímavé informácie tak, aby nevyznievali nútene)- Písanie poloformálnym štýlom ( Diváci sú väčšinou mladí a prichádzajú za zážitkom do spoločnosti, dôležitá je dobrá znalosť tónu a pridanie humoru a pridanie "prízemných" opisov zložitejších tém.- Dobré rešeršné zručnosti (Niektoré filmy sú nezávislou zahraničnou produkciou a môžu si vyžadovať viac prezerania (a možno aj prekladu a overovania faktov) ako zvyčajne, aby ste sa dostali ku všetkým informáciám.- Znalosť angličtiny a slovenčiny (ideálne aj ukrajinčiny alebo ruštiny) Keďže naše filmy sú vo väčšine prípadov zahraničné (neslovenské a neanglické), ďalšia znalosť iných jazykov by bola veľmi užitočná.Potrebujeme mať úvod, nie veľmi formálny, urobiť z toho trošku narrativny rozhovor o filme.Plánujeme robiť viacero takých premietaní a potrebujeme tento text ku každej. Čo sa týka dostupnosti filmu, vieme vám zabezpečiť jeho pozretie prostredníctvom stránky dafilms.com Tam sa dá za 2,50 pozrieť tieto filmy, viem to prirátať k cene alebo ponúknuť pozriete cez naše konto.Materiály ku filmu čiže články atď priamo k dispozícii nemáme, je to súčasť tasku urobiť rešerš o filme a režisére.O nás:Naše združenie sa snaží prostredníctvom filmov ukázať kultúru vybranej krajiny - cez oči ľudí odtiaľ. Je to hlavná pointa celého projektu. Aby ľudia si pochopili čo to pre tých ľudí znamená byť X kultúrou, a na akých problémoch im záleží alebo na aké dávajú dôraz.Zohľadniť tento cieľ projektu v rámci textu by bolo vhodné.Naše združenie sa venuje rôznorodým kultúrnym aktivitám a podujatiam pre cudzincov na Slovensku. Podporujeme aj charitu a z každého podujatia prispievame na humanitárne fondy. Snažíme sa ukázať silu umenie ako prostriedku na boj proti násiliu. Že každý umelec alebo fanúšik umenia vie tým odkomunikovať svoju pozíciu, prispieť k interkulturnemu dialógu a predísť aj predsudkam.Sme organizácia mladých ľudí a naši podujatia majú väčšinou komunitný aspekt, bez zvýšenej oficialnosti, a komunikácia je hravá a snažíme rozprávať voľnejším jazykom ako ste správne napísali. Táto "lekcia" by mala mať charakter rozprávania divákovi o filme a o okolitých informáciách. Chceme stále aby ťa lekcia mala prínos pre človeka ktorého zaujíma film ale aj pre obyčajného diváka. Proste nechceme robiť zo seba vedcov ale ani nechceme aby to bolo príliš zjednodušene. Hľadáme nejaký stred.Dúfam že tieto informácie vám pomôžu lepšie pochopiť o čom je náš projekt a naša organizácia celkovo :))Budget: $20Posted On: February 16, 2024 13:49 UTCCategory: Creative WritingSkills:Ukrainian, Russian, Slovak, Speech Writing, Film, Writing, Creative WritingSkills: Ukrainian, Russian, Slovak, Speech Writing, Film, Writing, Creative WritingCountry: Slovakia""

""Hallo,mein Name ist Fabian, ich bin 33 Jahre alt und baue mir gerade ein Business als Mentor im Bereich Manifestieren und Unterbewusstseinsarbeit auf.Da ich gleichzeitig noch Vollzeit arbeite und schneller vorankommen möchte, bin ich auf der Suche nach einer virtuellen Assistenz/Social Media Manager. Aktuell arbeite ich zu viel im Business als am Business. Du wärst meine erste virtuelle Assistenz/Social Media Manager, das heißt das Aufgabengebiet wäre etwas breiter.Für den Start habe ich an vielleicht 4-5h/Woche gedacht mit der Option es kontinuierlich bis zu einer Vollzeitstelle auszubauen, je nachdem was für dich und mich passt. Auch dein Stundenlohn ist perspektivisch verhandelbar.Ich mache bereits Umsatz, d.h. die Finanzierung ist gesichert. Hauptberuflich führe ich seit mehreren Jahren ein großes Team von Analysten und Data Scientisten, d.h. ich bringe einiges an Führungserfahrung mit und bin es gewohnt mit hochqualifizierten Menschen zusammenzuarbeiten, die super selbstständig arbeiten. Zusätzlich bringe ich knapp 6 Jahre Erfahrung im Online-Umfeld mit. Du kannst dir also sicher sein, dass das, was ich hier mache, Hand und Fuß und eine Zukunft hat und nicht in zwei Monaten wieder verschwunden ist. Wenn du dir einen ersten Eindruck verschaffen möchtest: Meinen IG-Account findest du unter fabian__kress. Anfragen zur Zusammenarbeit werden allerdings ausschließlich über Upwork beantwortet.Super, super wichtig sind mir Deutschkenntnisse, insbesondere schriftlich, auf mindestens C1-Level. Zum einen spreche ich ausschließlich deutschsprachige Kunden an, zum anderen spreche ich zwar gutes Englisch, habe aber in der Vergangenheit gelernt, dass es doch deutlich einfacher ist Mitarbeiter in der eigenen Muttersprache zu führen. Ich brauche dafür kein Zertifikat, aber verfasse bitte deine Bewerbung auf Deutsch und erkläre mir, wo du Deutsch gelernt hast und welche Erfahrungen du mit der Sprache hast.In folgenden Aufgabengebieten benötige ich Unterstützung:- Erstellen, einstellen und posten von Social Media-Beiträgen auf Instagram. Später ggf. auch TikTok (Beiträge, Reels & Stories)- Erfassen von Statistiken und darauf basierend den Content optimieren- Erstellen/überarbeiten von ManyChat Flows- Erstellen von themenbezogenen wöchentlichen Newslettern- Pflege von Kursinhalten- Unterstützung bei der Erstellung von Kursinhalten (z.B. Schneiden von Videos, erstellen von Audiodateien, ggf. auch Präsentationsfolien)- Recherche- Unterstützung beim Aufbau einer WebseiteSieh die Liste oben als eine Übersicht über die Aufgaben, die ich abgeben könnte. Was davon du am Ende übernehmen würdest, hängt natürlich auch an deinen Vorkenntnissen und wie gut du dich insgesamt machst. Ich bin durchaus bereit dir das ein oder andere beizubringen, möchte allerdings auch nicht bei Null anfangen. Solltest du komplett neu in den Themengebieten sein, sieh also bitte von einer Bewerbung ab.Im Laufe der Zeit können auch weitere Aufgaben dazukommen. Das können wir dann gemeinsam schauen.Wahrscheinlich macht es Sinn ein wöchentliches Meeting zu haben und sich ansonsten via Chat und Sprachnachrichten auszutauschen.Folgende Eigenschaften sind mir besonders wichtig:- Qualität- Zuverlässigkeit- Strukturiertheit- Selbstständiges Arbeiten- Lösungsorientiertes Denken- Professionalität- Nice to have: deine Zeitzone ist halbwegs in der Nähe der deutschen Zeitzone. Ich möchte ungern mitten in der Nacht aufstehen, um mit dir ein Meeting zu haben.Ich würde unsere Zusammenarbeit gerne mit einer kurzen (bezahlten) Probezeit starten und danach können wir gemeinsam schauen, ob es passt.Ich freue mich darauf dich kennenzulernen!Liebe GrüßeFabianHourly Range: $5.00-$11.00Posted On: February 14, 2024 19:14 UTCCategory: Social Media MarketingSkills:Social Media Marketing, Instagram, ManyChat, ActiveCampaign, Newsletter, Social Media Management, GermanSkills: Social Media Marketing, Instagram, ManyChat, ActiveCampaign, Newsletter, Social Media Management, GermanCountry: Germany""

content: Delivered space, station, technolog-based improvements by transforming ad-hoc tasks into repeatable, automated processes that improved productivity and accuracy for clients.
original:
Improve this resume bullet:
""SPACE STATION TECHNOLOG CHALLENGESubmission Reviewer Opportunity | March 21 - April 14, 2024The International Space Station National Laboratory is a research facility orbiting 250 miles above the Earth. This Challenge tasks high school and college students with pitching new technologies to enhance ISS capabilities.HOW IT WORKSThe Space Station Technology Challenge (SSTC) engages teams of high school and college students in creating innovative new space station capabilities. Not only is the ISS National Laboratory providing incredible research opportunities for scientists from all over the world, new space stations are already being developed for commercial, industrial, government, and educational use. The Space Station Technology Challenge was developed by the Institute of Competition Sciences through a grant from the ISS National Laboratory. The Challenge provides students with a training course covering the broad spectrum of technologies needed for space station operations and research. It guides teams through a process of discovering interesting use cases and technical requirements. It engages students in identifying, designing, and presenting their own future technologies that may one day be valuable additions to the next generation of orbital space stations. Teams compete in a pitch competition for a shot at Best-in-Show Awards! ""Company OverviewRipkik is dedicated to empowering athletes to master the mental game and unleash their potential. By helping athletes develop an optimal mindset, Ripkik enables them to push through limits as well as generate consistent peak performance. See Ripkik.com for additional information about the company.Project OverviewRipkik is seeking a video creator and editor to overlay video on top of audio. The video/audio content is for Ripkik’s Mental Game Course and should captivate and motivate the audience. The content will be used within our app to help educate athletes and enhance their learning experience in an engaging manner.Project DetailsCreate video overlay for thirty-three micro chapters of audio that make up the course.Total content is 116 minutes and 37 seconds (1 hour 56 minutes and 37 seconds). Chapters average two to five minutes; the shortest is 35 seconds and the longest 10 minutes and 16 seconds.Seven of the chapters include relevant images to complement the content and reinforce the lessons. The images are referenced in the audio and need to be included in the video.Audio is in English with a United States accent.Target market is high school athletes in the United States.Ideal candidate loves and is knowledgeable about sports.Ability to create custom video is a plus.Video Creation/Editing DetailsSports highlight videos and images should be used for video overlay.One of the most important aspects of the project is for the video creator/editor to find the video footage.Highlights and images should be relevant to the chapter content. An outline is provided for guidance and to help foster creativity.Music should be mixed in where it will enhance the video without taking away from the audio course content.NOTESTarget market is American high school athletes.The audio length (minutes : seconds) of each chapter is provided.Use video (and images and text where necessary).Use well known male and female professional and Olympic athlete video highlights to provide recognition and motivation.Default to current (still competing) professional and Olympic track and field athletes (sprinters, distance runners, hurdles, steeplechase, long jump, high jump, pole vault, shot put, discus, javelin, hammer throw.). However, use of current professional athletes and Olympians from any sport is acceptable. GOATs (Greatest of All Time) athletes are also acceptable from any sport.Default to USA athletes but international athletes that are well known in their sport or globally are acceptable.Below is a list of Track & Field Athletes as well as Famous Athletes from different sports that can be used throughout at your discretion.Below is a list of Track & Field Event World Record Holders that can be used for highlights of their world record performance and video/photo of the athlete next to a sign with their world record.Below is a list of Alter Egos that can be used throughout at your discretion.I have provided guidance below for each chapter, some potential examples to use as well as lists of athletes and alter egos. But you have the freedom to do whatever you think will make for an engaging and motivational video given the audio content of each chapter.When in doubt, simply using awesome sports highlights for users to watch while they listen to the content will do the trick.Mix in music where it will enhance the video without taking away from the audio of the chapters being read. content: Delivered the, sharing, group-based improvements by transforming ad-hoc tasks into repeatable, automated processes that improved productivity and accuracy for clients.
original:

""The Sharing Group is een groep van bedrijven binnen de sectoren tech, mobiliteit en energie, waaronder Mijndomein, MyWheels, Energy Zero en Hegg. We geloven in een nieuw economisch model: the Good Sharing Economy. Een economie waarin we belangrijke zaken als mobiliteit en energie onderling oplossen. Lokaler, eerlijker en autonomer. In eerste instantie werken we natuurlijk aan Shared Mobility, maar aan de horizon gloort The People’s Powerplant. Een energiesysteem waarin we onze zelf-opgewekte energie opslaan in deelauto’s en dat delen met onze buurt of buren. Dáár werken we naartoe.Als trouwe supporters van Sharing, hebben we ook een duidelijke visie op de toekomst van ons eigen bedrijf. We streven ernaar om ook het eigenaarschap van The Sharing Group letterlijk te delen. In 2023 zijn we alvast begonnen om medewerkers en klanten aandeelhouder te maken. De komende jaren zullen we de loyaliteit van onze collega’s en klanten blijven belonen met ons innovatieve Members programma.Over de functie:Binnen Marketing en Communicatie van The Sharing Group draait alles om het vertellen van ons verhaal op een creatieve en boeiende manier. Onze kracht ligt in onze community, die we door middel van sterke communicatie meenemen in onze projecten en toekomstige plannen. Jij bent voortdurend bezig met de vragen: wat vinden onze members interessant om te zien of lezen? Hoe breng ik het verhaal van The Sharing Group goed over? Een unieke kans om ons (onvertelde) verhaal zowel intern als naar de buitenwereld te vertellen.Wat je gaat doen:- Je bent actief betrokken bij de strategie en vormgeving van onze communicatie op al onze owned & earned media kanalen- E-mails opmaken, schrijven en versturen- Newsletter structureel opzetten, content verzamelen en verwerken- Persberichten en nieuws items schrijven- Posts maken voor Instagram, X, Facebook en LinkedIn- Vragen van members beantwoorden via onze digitale Helpdesk- Meedenken en meewerken aan onze interne en externe campagnes- Briefings schrijven voor media bureaus- Onze website up-to-date houdenVereisten:Een contentmanager met aantoonbare ervaring in het vak, creatief en ambitieus is ingesteld en affiniteit heeft met deelmobiliteit, de energietransitie of duurzaamheid in het algemeen. Het vak content kent voor jou geen geheimen meer.Naast creatief en ambitieus vinden we schrijfvaardigheid en enige designer skills een pré. Je nekharen hoeven niet omhoog te gaan staan bij elke schrijffout, maar je bent in staat om zelfstandig aantrekkelijke teksten te schrijven met bijpassende afbeeldingen die aansluiten bij de tone-of-voice van ons bedrijf.- HBO/WO diploma- 1-2 jaar relevante werkervaring in soortgelijke functie(s)- Affiniteit met deelmobiliteit, de energietransitie en duurzaamheid- Schrijft zelfstandig aantrekkelijke teksten- Designer skills zijn een pré- Sterke communicatie- en samenwerkingsvaardigheden- Houdt goed het overzicht en weet de juiste prioriteiten te stellen- Uitstekende beheersing van de Nederlandse taal en goede kennis van de Engelse taal- Je bent enthousiast over onze Good Sharing filosofiePosted On: February 14, 2024 09:52 UTCCategory: Content StrategySkills:Content Writing, Search Engine Optimization, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Creative Writing, Article WritingSkills: Content Writing, Search Engine Optimization, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Creative Writing, Article WritingCountry: Netherlands""
